meanings.sent1: She was toting her heavy backpack to school every day.
meanings.sent2: The delivery man was toting a large package to the customer's door.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was toting her teddy bear around the house, pretending it was her baby.
meanings.sent4: He was toting the weight of his mistakes on his shoulders, feeling burdened.
meanings.sent5: The farmer was toting buckets of water to the thirsty crops under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent1: The workers were toting heavy boxes into the warehouse all day.
meanings.sent2: She was toting groceries in both hands, trying not to drop anything.
meanings.sent3: The dog was toting its favorite toy around the yard, wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: He was toting his responsibilities like a heavy load, trying to balance them all.
meanings.sent5: The explorer was toting essential supplies through the dense jungle, determined to reach the destination.
